suggest.koco/messenger-kafka: if you want use kafka transport
suggest.3slab/vdm-library-http-transport-bundle: if you want use http as a source
suggest.3slab/vdm-library-ftp-transport-bundle: if you want use ftp as a source
suggest.3slab/vdm-library-amqp-transport-bundle: if you want use amqp as a source
suggest.3slab/vdm-library-elasticsearch-transpor: if you want use elasticsearch as a destination
suggest.3slab/vdm-library-doctrine-orm-transport: if you want use doctrine orm as a destination
suggest.3slab/vdm-library-doctrine-odm-transport: if you want use doctrine odm as a destination
suggest.phpoffice/phpspreadsheet: if you want to format excel files
